parameters.query:
SELECT phone, flow, step, expected_ref, data_json, expires_at,phoneconectado
FROM sessions
WHERE phone = {{ $json.Phone }} and phoneconectado = {{ $json.PhoneConnected }}

UNION ALL

SELECT {{ $json.Phone }} AS phone, NULL AS flow, NULL AS step, NULL AS expected_ref, NULL AS data_json, NULL AS expires_at, {{ $json.PhoneConnected }} AS phoneconectado
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sessions WHERE phone = {{ $json.Phone }} and phoneconectado = {{ $json.PhoneConnected }} )
LIMIT 1;

parameter.value: =Finalizando a consulta de faturas em aberto ...

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO sessions (phone, flow, step, expected_ref, data_json, expires_at,phoneconectado)
VALUES (
  '{{$json.session.phone}}',
  '{{$json.session.flow}}',
  {{$json.session.step}},
  {{ $json.session.expectedRef ? "'" + $json.session.expectedRef + "'" : "NULL" }},
  CAST('{{ JSON.stringify($json.session.data || {}) }}' AS JSON),
  '{{$json.session.expiresAt}}','{{ $json.session.phoneconectado }}'
)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  flow         = '{{$json.session.flow}}',
  step         = {{$json.session.step}},
  expected_ref = {{ $json.session.expectedRef ? "'" + $json.session.expectedRef + "'" : "NULL" }},
  data_json ='{{ JSON.stringify($json.session.data || {}) }}',
  expires_at   = '{{$json.session.expiresAt}}';
